resources.string: confirm delete all card and image information?

Usage: 1. Enable module 2. Open the card package in the settings and see the image that needs to be replaced 3. Return to the application dropdown to refresh 4. After the target image appears, click on the image to the right of the arrow and enter the file name where you want to replace the image 5. Open a file manager (such as the mt file manager) and grant root permission to copy the image to be replaced to/data/data/com. zhizi42. diymiuicard/files/images/and/data/data/com. mii. tsmclient/files/images/, and modify the permissions to be readable by anyone 6. Reopen the card package, and the image should have changed by now.
Don\'t filter small cards and logos now
Now filter the small cards and logos
DIY MIUI Card v1.1,code by zhizi42(AI丿质子)
